comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content:
Harry H. Brown  Aero Club of America  Pilot # 58  Sept. 7, 1911
During 1912 Brown flew from a private airport near Hicksville, Long Island , New York.
( Menendez Corner 4 miles east of Hempstead , Long Island, New York.)
Brown also had  F. Rodman Law make parachute drops from this aircraft during 1912.
I believe this photo was taken at the flying field at Hicksville, Long Island, New York
